Header: Fairly cold weather is expected to continue
Content: The Met Department announces that fairly cold weather is expected to continue over the island particularly in Northern, North-central, Central, North-western and Eastern provinces. Showers or thunder showers may occur at a few places in the Central province and in Ratnapura, Galle and Matara districts. Mainly fair weather will continue elsewhere.Fairly strong gusty winds up to 40 Kilometers per hour can be expected over Western and Uva provinces and in the Ampara, Puttalam, Kegalle and Hambanthota districts. Misty conditions can be expected at some places in the Central province and Ratnapura district during the morning.Mainly fair weather will prevail over the sea areas around the island.Winds will be North-easterly and wind speed will be 30-40 Kilometers per hour in the sea areas around the island. The sea area off the coast extending from Mannar to Galle via Puttalam and Colombo and also in the sea area off the coast extending from Matara to Pottuvil via Hambantota can be rough at times as the wind speed can increased up to 50-60 Kilometers per hour at times.
